name: Vogoth
aura: Increases Ally ACC in all Battles by 40.

skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Each hit has a 30% chance of increasing the duration of 1 random debuff on the target by 1 turn.

Attacks all enemies. Has a 60% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff on all enemies for 1 turn. Also has a 60% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns on targets who receive [Provoke] debuff from this skill.

Whenever this Champion is attacked, heals all allies by 50% of the damage received. [Only heals by 25% of the damage received from boss attacks. This champion only receives half of the heal that all other allies receive.]

When attacked, places a [Leech] debuff on the attacker for 2 turns. If the attacker is under a [Provoke] debuff placed by this Champion, also has a 70% chance of increasing the cooldown of a random skill on the attacker by 2 turns. Occurs once per attack.
